price: Nuko barigaya ubwabo, maze barabwirana bati “Mu by’ukuri ni mwe nkozi z’ibibi.”
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
